io.micronaut.core.type

Class DefaultArgument<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.core.type.DefaultArgument<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The argument type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnotatedElement, AnnotationMetadataProvider, AnnotationSource, Named, Argument<T>, TypeVariableResolver, java.lang.reflect.Type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericArgument

    @Internal
public class DefaultArgument<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Argument<T>
    Represents an argument to a constructor or method.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher

      • equalsType

        public boolean equalsType(Argument<?> o)
        Description copied from interface: Argument
        Whether the types are equivalent. The regular Object.equals(Object) implementation includes the argument name within the comparison so this method offers a variation that just compares types.
        Specified by:
        equalsType in interface Argument<T>
        Parameters:
        o - The type type
        Returns:
        True if they are equal
